alert.note: Alert for Barber; Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kiowa, Barber, northeastern Comanche and southeastern Pratt Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cairo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cairo around 120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Isabel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
